title: Initial Page - Senator Husted
main_content: HUSTED, Jon Allen, a Senator from Ohio; born in Detroit, Mich., August 25, 1967; graduated Montpelier High School, Montpelier, Ohio, 1985; B.A., education, University of Dayton, 1989; M.A., communications, University of Dayton, 1992; vice president for economic development, Dayton area chamber of commerce; member of the Ohio house of representatives, 2001-2009, serving as speaker of the house, 2005-2009; member of the Ohio state senate, 2009-2011; Ohio secretary of state, 2011-2019; lieutenant governor of Ohio, 2019-2025; appointed as a Republican to the United States Senate to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of J.D. Vance for the term ending January 3, 2029; took the oath of office on January 21, 2025. Washington DC SR-198 Russell Senate Office Building Washington, DC 20510 P# 202-224-3353 Prefix First Name Last Name Street Address Address Line 2 City State Alabama Alaska Arizona Arkansas California Colorado Connecticut Delaware Washington DC Florida Georgia Hawaii Idaho Illinois Indiana Iowa Kansas Kentucky Louisiana Maine Maryland Massachusetts Michigan Minnesota Mississippi "Missouri Montana Nebraska Nevada New Hampshire New Jersey New Mexico New York North Carolina North Dakota Ohio Oklahoma Oregon Pennsylvania Rhode Island South Carolina South Dakota Tennessee Texas Utah Vermont Virginia Washington West Virginia Wisconsin Wyoming Zip Phone Email Topic Agriculture Animals Arts and Humanities Banking Budget and Economy Campaign Finance Help with a Federal Agency Campaign Finance Reform Civil Rights/Humanities Civil Service/Postal Congress and Elections Congressional Issues Child Tax Credit CWC-Opt-in Defense and Military Defense Economy Education Higher Education eForm Response Energy E-News Reply E-News Subscribe Environmental Family/Marriage Federal Employees Flag Request Food Safety Foreign Relations Governmental Reform Guns Health Homeland Security Housing Housing & Urban Development Immigration Infrastructure International Relations Internship Request IRS Jobs and the Economy Judiciary Labor LGBT Military No Response Necessary CWC-No Response Necessary Website-No Response Necessary Office Registry Web Form Other Issues Passport Casework Post Office REGISTER to RESPOND Response Reply Science and Technology Security Senior Citizens Services Reply Small Business Social Issues Social Services Spam Opt-Out Social Security Subject Message Submit
